description: This file is an API client module for fetching product data, including mock data generation, environment configuration, and functions for retrieving product lists, facets, and individual product details.

methods.name: buildQuery
methods.description: Constructs a URL query string from parameters.

methods.name: filterAndPaginate
methods.description: Filters mock catalog items based on search criteria and paginates results.

methods.name: fetchProducts
methods.description: Fetches a list of products with optional filters and pagination, using mock data or API.

methods.name: fetchFacetOptions
methods.description: Retrieves available categories and brands for filtering, from mock data or API.

methods.name: fetchProductById
methods.description: Fetches detailed information for a single product by ID, from mock data or API.
